sentences.english: Participated in the Collge English Test Band Four and Six, and achieved excellent scores.
sentences.chinese: 参加英语四六级考试，并取得优异成绩。

sentences.english: ABS resin is a kind of thermoplastic resin with excellent allround properties.
sentences.chinese: ABS树脂是一种综合性能优异的热塑性树脂。

sentences.english: A: China did very well in the last Olympics in Athens.
sentences.chinese: 中国在上届雅典奥运会上取得了优异的成绩。

sentences.english: Power is the basis of achievement of track and field.
sentences.chinese: 爆发力是多数田径项目取得优异成绩的素质基础。

sentences.english: The Vista is equipped with large stabilizers & control surfaces for excellent handling and low speed controllability (elevator & stabilizer span is carefully matched to wing span).
sentences.chinese: 大跨度，高展弦比机翼提供优异攀登性能。

sentences.english: A batch of excellent germplasm resources were obtained by selection, which can be applied to quality breeding in adzuki bean.
sentences.chinese: 筛选出一批优异种质资源可应用于小豆品质育种。

sentences.english: The process is fast in deposition speed and excellent in corrosion resistance of the coating.
sentences.chinese: 该工艺沉积速率快，镀层耐蚀性优异。

sentences.english: Hi cady, i wish you also having a good passing result from this exam.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你这次考试也能取得优异的成绩，通过考试。

sentences.english: They distinguished themselves by raising 180 kg of ginned cotton per mu last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年他们取得了亩产皮棉180公斤的优异成绩。

sentences.english: In school, my grades were excellent, won first-class university in scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 在校期间，我成绩优异，获得过校级一等奖学金。

sentences.english: The only reason high school students learn is to ace the test.
sentences.chinese: 高中生学习的唯一原因就是考优异成绩。

sentences.english: The product has excellent hang wall spreading property, fully role to each site.
sentences.chinese: 本品具有优异的挂壁铺展性，充分作用到每一个部位。

sentences.english: As the world-class golf villa, Yunling's outstanding quality is impressive.
sentences.chinese: 作为世界级的高尔夫别墅，云岭的优异品质令人惊叹。

sentences.english: Owns the top causticity-resistance of pure PTFE.
sentences.chinese: 具有纯PTFE优异的耐腐蚀性。

sentences.english: Dr. Li graduated from the Shanghai Medical University with the highest honors.
sentences.chinese: 李先生以优异的成绩从上海医科大学毕业。

sentences.english: But you succeed. You ace the exams and get into Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 但是你成功了，你成绩优异，进入了北京大学。

definition: worthy of pride/impressive/enviable/to show contempt for others
top-notch (colloquial)/to push oneself to the front
